title: Hesitant to tell my friends about my good grades due to fear of evil eye, what to do Assim al hakeem
transcript: uh faizan from india says i do well with the great of with the grace of allah in exams and sometimes non-muslims ask me about my results so i am hesitant to tell them for the fear of their evil eye bearing in mind that i observe my athkar in the morning in the evening after far salat before going to bed and before leaving the house if this is the case faizan you have nothing to worry about if they ask you you can tell them this is oh these are my grades and feel confident that allah azzawajal will protect you and that they are or they will not be able to harm you the least
